name: Extended Loop Green
description:
Do your Job! Drive the train! Go to the  control panel and push some buttons or something.

There is no win condition. You will have to exit manually.

  • Entering is broken, couldn't fix it in time. Ether do a running start or use the button in the menu.
  • Light priority causes some lights (especially in the station) to flicker
  • movement is sub par. Script broke, no time to figure out why.
